 105:         """
 106:         OAM DMA copies an entire page (wrapping at the page boundary if the start address in ppu's oam_addr is not zero)
 107:         from RAM to ppu OAM.  This also causes the cpu to pause for 513 or 514 cycles.

 110:         """
